title: version:branch 0.4.1
body_html:
i git clone branch0.4.1,
git clone --recursive -b v0.4.1 https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
and install from source, after install, use python print pytorch version, is
>>> torch.__version__
0.5.0a0+a24163a
and i find version in setup.py, is also 0.5.0a0, but i install from Binaries, print info is 0.4.1.
why??
body_text:
i git clone branch0.4.1,

why??
body:
i git clone branch0.4.1, 
`git clone --recursive -b v0.4.1 https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git`
and install from source, after install, use python print pytorch version, is 
`>>> torch.__version__ `
0.5.0a0+a24163a
and i find version in setup.py, is also 0.5.0a0, but i install from Binaries, print info is 0.4.1.
why??
